Detailed Description

I2C driver implementation for a PRU I2C FW.

============================================================================

The I2C header file should be included in an application as follows:

#include <ti/drv/i2c/I2C.h>
#include <ti/drv/i2c/soc/I2C_soc.h>

Typedef Documentation

typedef enum I2C_ConfigMode_e I2C_ConfigMode

I2C mode.

This enum defines the state of the I2C driver's state-machine. Do not modify.

typedef struct I2C_PRU_IOPinMuxAttrs_s I2C_PRU_IOPinMuxAttrs

PRUICSS IO Pin Mux hardware attributes.

I2C PRU SOC Input/Output pin mux register structure

typedef struct I2C_TransactionCmd_s I2C_TransactionCmd

I2C V2 Object.

The application must not access any member variables of this structure!

typedef enum I2C_TransferCmd_e I2C_TransferCmd

I2C CMD.

This are the smbus command for smbus operation I2C transaction Command

This structure defines the nature of the I2C transaction Command.

I2C SMBUS mode: This structure specifies the SMBUS command and the sub command code required with the command.

typedef struct I2C_v2_Object_s I2C_v2_Object

I2C PRU Config Mode.

The application must not access any member variables of this structure!

typedef struct PRU_funct_mode_s PRU_funct_mode

I2C ICSS Config Mode.

The application must not access any member variables of this structure!

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum I2C_ConfigMode_e

I2C mode.

This enum defines the state of the I2C driver's state-machine. Do not modify.
